title: Bacon

nouns: The edible flesh of animals, especially that of mammals.
Meat is the flesh of an animal which is eaten.
Animal flesh used as food
Animal flesh eaten as food
Animal flesh used as food.
Meat is animal flesh that is eaten as food.
The flesh of an animal used as food.
The flesh of animals (including fishes and birds and snails) used as food
Cured meat from the sides, belly or back of a pig.
Back and sides of a hog salted and dried or smoked; usually sliced thin and fried
Bacon is a meat product prepared from a pig and usually cured.
Bacon is a cured meat prepared from a pig.
The flesh of the back and sides of a pig, salted and dried, used as food.
Cured meat from a pig
Any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body. For prepared ready-to-eat food, use dish: Q746549.
Any substance consumed by living organisms to sustain life.
Food.
Any substance that can be consumed by living organisms, especially by eating, in order to sustain life.
Any solid substance (as opposed to liquid) that is used as a source of nourishment
Food is any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body.

description: Strips of crispy, fatty, reddish-brown bacon, as fried for breakfast. Depicted as a pair on most platforms.
apple_vendor_description: Appleâ€™s bacon emoji presents a mouthwatering depiction of strips of crispy, sizzling bacon, rendered with a delicious realism. The glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting bring out the rich, savory textures and inviting colors, while the smooth gradients and soft rounded edges give it an appetizing appeal. This emoji is a fantastic way to express cravings, a love for breakfast, or a desire for something delicious in digital communication.
